done.text:
Successfully completed the task! I have navigated to the Satyajit Ray Wikipedia article following the complete workflow:

1. ‚úì Navigated to Google (https://www.google.com)
2. ‚úì Entered search query: 'Satyajit Ray Wikipedia'
3. ‚úì Selected the correct Wikipedia search result
4. ‚úì Verified the article loaded successfully

The Satyajit Ray Wikipedia article is now open at: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Satyajit_Ray

The page has loaded completely with all expected elements including:
- Article title: Satyajit Ray
- Table of contents with sections on Background, Film career, Literary works, Filmmaking style, Legacy, and more
- Full Wikipedia navigation and interface
- Article content ready for viewing

The task has been completed successfully.
